          <title>
            <string language="en">Recessional speed-distance graph for galaxies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Recessional Geschwindigkeit-Abstand Diagramm für
Galaxien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphique de vitesse-distance de Recessional pour
des galaxies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráfico da velocidade-distância de Recessional 
para galáxias</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafico di velocità-distanza di Recessional per 
le galassie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφική παράσταση ταχύτητα-απόστασης Recessional 
για τους γαλαξίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gráfico de la velocidad-distancia de Recessional 
para las galaxias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph plots the variation of recessional speed with distance for galaxies.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique trace la variation de la vitesse de 
recessional avec la distance pour des galaxies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico traça a variação da velocidade

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico traccia la variazione di velocità

          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico traza la variación de la velocidad
